title: Did Javid Go Off-Piste at Davos?
itunes:title: Did Javid Go Off-Piste at Davos?
description:
The Chancellor has said an EU trade deal takes priority over any agreement with the U.S. And now his proposed digital tax could prompt even frostier relations with Washington. Bloomberg's trade tsar Brendan Murray and Brexit editor Edward Evans joined Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek to discuss Sajid Javid's motivations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
